text: Severin Ntahomvukiye (born 1944) is a Burundian politician. He served as foreign minister of Burundi from 1998 - 2001.http://www.china.org.cn/english/features/focac/183578.htm China visitors ==References== Category:Living people Category:1944 births Category:Foreign ministers of Burundi Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Severin Ntahomvukiye
